text: 21|90|nām avaruṭaiya pirārttaṉaiyai aṅkīkarittu (malaṭāka irunta) avaruṭaiya maṉaiviyai kuṇappaṭutti, yahyāvai avarukku(c cantatiyākak) koṭuttōm. Niccayamāka ivarkaḷ aṉaivarum naṉmaiyāṉa kāriyaṅkaḷaic ceyvatil oruvarai oruvar muntik koṇṭiruntārkaḷ. (Nam aruḷai) virumpiyum (nam taṇṭaṉaiyaip) payantum nam'miṭam pirārttaṉai ceytu koṇṭiruntārkaḷ. Ivarkaḷ aṉaivarum nam'miṭam mikka uḷḷaccamuṭaiyavarkaḷākavum iruntārkaḷ
